Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto eight incomplete lines of a business text, perhaps a division of parts of a slaughtered ox. On the verso four lines of a list of empty jars for oil and fat held by Horemwia.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J. J. Černy and A.H. Gardiner, ‘Hieratic Ostraca’ (Oxford 1957), p.17 and pl. LVII,3
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136394) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136394)
